subject: [Ip-health] ABA page on Health and Pharmaceutical Antitrust Issues
body:
> From: "Leibenluft, Robert F."
> Date: June 2, 2007 10:47:57 AM EDT
> Subject: [AT-HCIC] New link to proposed Health and Pharmaceutical
> Legislation
>
> The Health Care and Pharmaceuticals Committee has recently posted a
> new link that provides access to proposed legislation and related
> hearings information regarding health care and pharmaceuticals
> antitrust issues.  Here's the link:
>
> http://www.abanet.org/antitrust/at-committees/at-hcic/proposed.shtml
> We thank Eric Stock for creating this new addition to our website.
>
>
